prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Henry Giles, Accession #8581-a , Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In a letter to an unidentified woman Giles accepts an invitation to come to Baltimore. He mentions a Miss Fick, who chose the subject "Charlotte Bronte" for him.
